echo.message: cryptotest createcerts initwallet [-Dlocalhost=0] inittestpage jcspaper svg-test svg-pushmode svg-pullmode svg-play svg-pinkeyboard -Dplayclass [-Dplayfilter]

fail.message: "openkeystore.src" does not point to a valid installation directory!

-
***************************************************************
You must specify the "playclass" residing in the directory
"org/webpki/tools/svg/test/play"
using the -D option
You may also specify a "playfilter" residing in the directory
"svg-filters/play"
using the -D option
***************************************************************
